segments.text: My attention is drawn to the left side of the room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a boy precariously balanced on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into a cookie jar, quite stealthily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly unstable; its legs are splayed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see it's tilting backward, about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A little girl stands nearby, eagerly waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's holding out her hand, anticipating a sweet treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a rather clever scheme, if only it weren't so dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself trying to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sight of him reaching up like that makes me anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are definitely breaking a rule here, I can tell.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But their coordinated effort is almost admirable.
segments.speaker: PAR
